body:
Comment 2 by **c.schmid.batchy**: 
DISABLE_NET_TEST=1 helped to pass the TestServeFile.

still when 127.0.0.1 is blocked (iptables) the source does not compile.

to finally be able to compile the source i had to add the following lines to the
"NOTEST"-section of the /src/pkg/Makefile

        http\
        net\
        netchan\
        rpc\
        syslog\
        websocket\
